import React from"react";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";var useStyles=makeStyles({bar:{position:"absolute",display:"flex",bottom:"0",left:0,color:"#ffffff",textAlign:"center"}});export default function SortingBar(props){var classes=useStyles();// const barstyle = { width: `${props.width}px`, height: `${props.height}px` };
return React.createElement("div",{id:"sortBar",className:classes.bar,style:{width:"".concat(props.width,"px"),height:"".concat(props.height,"px"),left:"".concat(props.index*(props.width+2),"px"),backgroundColor:"".concat(props.color)}});}
